trans-unit.source: Streaming Logs
trans-unit.target: Streaming Logs

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Azure Portal provides an integrated streaming log viewer that lets you view tracing events from
trans-unit.target: The Microsoft Azure Portal provides an integrated streaming log viewer that lets you view tracing events from

trans-unit.source: your Azure App Service web apps in real time.
trans-unit.target: your Azure App Service web apps in real time.

trans-unit.source: Setting this up requires a few simple steps:
trans-unit.target: Setting this up requires a few simple steps:

trans-unit.source: Write traces in your code
trans-unit.target: Write traces in your code

trans-unit.source: Enable Application Diagnostics from within the Azure Portal
trans-unit.target: Enable Application Diagnostics from within the Azure Portal

trans-unit.source: Click on the streaming logs part on the web app's blade
trans-unit.target: Click on the streaming logs part on the web app's blade

trans-unit.source: How to write traces in your code
trans-unit.target: How to write traces in your code

trans-unit.source: Writing traces in your code is easy.
trans-unit.target: Writing traces in your code is easy.

trans-unit.source: In C# it's as easy as writing the following code:
trans-unit.target: In C# it's as easy as writing the following code:

trans-unit.source: The Trace class lives in the System.Diagnostics namespace.
trans-unit.target: The Trace class lives in the System.Diagnostics namespace.

trans-unit.source: In a node.js app you can write this code to achieve the same result:
trans-unit.target: In a node.js app you can write this code to achieve the same result:

trans-unit.source: How to enable and view the streaming logs
trans-unit.target: How to enable and view the streaming logs

trans-unit.source: ![][BrowseSitesScreenshot]
trans-unit.target: ![][BrowseSitesScreenshot]

trans-unit.source: Diagnostics are enabled on a per web app basis.
trans-unit.target: Diagnostics are enabled on a per web app basis.

trans-unit.source: From within the [portal](https://portal.azure.com) click the
trans-unit.target: From within the [portal](https://portal.azure.com) click the

trans-unit.source: **Browse (1)** button on the left menu bar and then click **Web Apps (2)** to get to the **list (3)** of
trans-unit.target: **Browse (1)** button on the left menu bar and then click **Web Apps (2)** to get to the **list (3)** of

trans-unit.source: all your web apps.
trans-unit.target: all your web apps.

trans-unit.source: Click on the name of the web app that you want to configure to navigate to it.
trans-unit.target: Click on the name of the web app that you want to configure to navigate to it.

trans-unit.source: ![][DiagnosticsLogs]
trans-unit.target: ![][DiagnosticsLogs]

trans-unit.source: Then click **Settings (1)** > **Diagnostic Logs (2)** and turn **On**
trans-unit.target: Then click **Settings (1)** > **Diagnostic Logs (2)** and turn **On**

trans-unit.source: **Application Logging (Filesystem)(3)** The **Level** option letts you change the severity
trans-unit.target: **Application Logging (Filesystem)(3)** The **Level** option letts you change the severity

trans-unit.source: level of traces to capture.
trans-unit.target: level of traces to capture.

trans-unit.source: You should set this to **Verbose** if you're just trying to
trans-unit.target: You should set this to **Verbose** if you're just trying to

trans-unit.source: get familiar with the feature as this will ensure all of your trace statements get logged.
trans-unit.target: get familiar with the feature as this will ensure all of your trace statements get logged.

trans-unit.source: Click **SAVE** at the top of the blade and you're ready to view logs.
trans-unit.target: Click **SAVE** at the top of the blade and you're ready to view logs.

trans-unit.source: **NOTE:** The higher the **severity level** the more resources are consumed to log and the more traces
trans-unit.target: **NOTE:** The higher the **severity level** the more resources are consumed to log and the more traces

trans-unit.source: you will get.
trans-unit.target: you will get.

trans-unit.source: Make sure this is set to the appropriate level when using this feature for
trans-unit.target: Make sure this is set to the appropriate level when using this feature for

trans-unit.source: a high traffic / production site.
trans-unit.target: a high traffic / production site.

trans-unit.source: ![][StreamingLogsScreenshot]
trans-unit.target: ![][StreamingLogsScreenshot]

trans-unit.source: To view the streaming logs from within the portal click **Tools (1)** > **Log Stream(2)**.
trans-unit.target: To view the streaming logs from within the portal click **Tools (1)** > **Log Stream(2)**.

trans-unit.source: If your app
trans-unit.target: If your app

trans-unit.source: is actively writing trace statements then you should see them in the resulting window in near real time.
trans-unit.target: is actively writing trace statements then you should see them in the resulting window in near real time.

trans-unit.source: Console
trans-unit.target: Console

trans-unit.source: The Azure Portal provides console access to your web app environment.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Portal provides console access to your web app environment.

trans-unit.source: You can explore your web
trans-unit.target: You can explore your web

trans-unit.source: app's file system and run powershell/cmd scripts.
trans-unit.target: app's file system and run powershell/cmd scripts.

trans-unit.source: You are bound by the same permissions set as
trans-unit.target: You are bound by the same permissions set as

trans-unit.source: your running web app code when executing console commands.
trans-unit.target: your running web app code when executing console commands.

trans-unit.source: You won't be able to access protected
trans-unit.target: You won't be able to access protected

trans-unit.source: directories or run scripts that require elevated permissions.
trans-unit.target: directories or run scripts that require elevated permissions.

trans-unit.source: ![][ConsoleScreenshot]
trans-unit.target: ![][ConsoleScreenshot]

trans-unit.source: To get to the console, browse to a web app as described in the section above.
trans-unit.target: To get to the console, browse to a web app as described in the section above.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Tools**>**Console** and the console will open.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Tools**>**Console** and the console will open.

trans-unit.source: To get familiar with the console try basic commands like these:
trans-unit.target: To get familiar with the console try basic commands like these:
